verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

When a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall have in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* a \w rising|strong="H7613"\w*, a \w scab|strong="H5597"\w*, or bright \w spot|strong="H0934"\w*, and it be in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add like\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*; then he shall be \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, or unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*:\f + \fr 13.2 \ft rising: or, swelling\f*

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: and \add when\add* the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* in the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* is \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*, and the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* in \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \add be\add* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, it \add is\add* a \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on him, and pronounce him \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

If the bright \w spot|strong="H0934"\w* \add be\add* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and in \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \add be\add* not \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, and the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* thereof be not \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*; then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* up \add him that hath\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on him the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* in his \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* be at a \w stay|strong="H5975"\w*, \add and\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* not in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*; then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* him up \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w more|strong="H8145"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on him \w again|strong="H8145"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add be\add* somewhat \w dark|strong="H3544"\w*, \add and\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* not in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*: it \add is but\add* a \w scab|strong="H4556"\w*: and he shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

But if the \w scab|strong="H4556"\w* spread \w much|strong="H6581"\w* \w abroad|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that he hath been \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* of the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* for his \w cleansing|strong="H2893"\w*, he shall be \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* of the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w again|strong="H8145"\w*:

And \add if\add* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that, behold, the \w scab|strong="H4556"\w* \w spreadeth|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: it \add is\add* a \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.
¶ When the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* is in a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, then he shall be \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*;

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add him:\add* and, behold, \add if\add* the \w rising|strong="H7613"\w* \add be\add* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, and it have \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*, and \add there be\add* \w quick|strong="H4241"\w* \w raw|strong="H2416"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in the \w rising|strong="H7613"\w*;\f + \fr 13.10 \ft quick…: Heb. the quickening of living flesh\f*

It \add is\add* an \w old|strong="H3462"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*, and shall not \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* him up: for he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

And if a \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* break \w out|strong="H6524"\w* \w abroad|strong="H6524"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, and the \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* all the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of \add him that hath\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* from his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* even to his \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, wheresoever the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w looketh|strong="H4758"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w consider|strong="H7200"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* have \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* all his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, he shall pronounce \add him\add* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w* \add that hath\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*: it is all \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*: he \add is\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.
But \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w raw|strong="H2416"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w appeareth|strong="H7200"\w* in him, he shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w raw|strong="H2416"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and pronounce him to be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: \add for\add* the \w raw|strong="H2416"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*: it \add is\add* a \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.

Or if the \w raw|strong="H2416"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and be \w changed|strong="H2015"\w* unto \w white|strong="H3836"\w*, he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*;

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* him: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* be \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* into \w white|strong="H3836"\w*; then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce \add him\add* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w* \add that hath\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*: he \add is\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.
¶ The \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* also, in \w which|strong="H3588"\w*, \add even\add* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* thereof, was a \w boil|strong="H7822"\w*, and is \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*,

And in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w boil|strong="H7822"\w* there be a \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w rising|strong="H7613"\w*, or a bright \w spot|strong="H0934"\w*, \w white|strong="H3836"\w*, and somewhat \w reddish|strong="H0125"\w*, and it be \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* to the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*;

And if, when the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* it, behold, it \add be\add* in \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \w lower|strong="H8217"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, and the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* thereof be \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*; the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: it \add is\add* a \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w broken|strong="H6524"\w* out of the \w boil|strong="H7822"\w*.

But if the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on it, and, behold, \add there be\add* no \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w hairs|strong="H8181"\w* therein, and \add if\add* it \add be\add* not \w lower|strong="H8217"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, but \add be\add* somewhat \w dark|strong="H3544"\w*; then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* him up \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

And if it spread \w much|strong="H6581"\w* \w abroad|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: it \add is\add* a \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*.

But if the bright \w spot|strong="H0934"\w* \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* in his place, \add and\add* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* not, it \add is\add* a \w burning|strong="H6867"\w* \w boil|strong="H7822"\w*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

¶ Or if there be \add any\add* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* whereof \add there is\add* a \w hot|strong="H0784"\w* \w burning|strong="H4348"\w*, and the \w quick|strong="H4241"\w* \add flesh\add* that \w burneth|strong="H4348"\w* have a \w white|strong="H3836"\w* bright \w spot|strong="H0934"\w*, somewhat \w reddish|strong="H0125"\w*, or \w white|strong="H3836"\w*;\f + \fr 13.24 \ft a hot…: Heb. a burning of fire\f*

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon it: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* in the bright \w spot|strong="H0934"\w* be \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*, and it \add be in\add* \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*; it \add is\add* a \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w broken|strong="H6524"\w* out of the \w burning|strong="H4348"\w*: wherefore the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: it \add is\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.

But if the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on it, and, behold, \add there be\add* no \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* in the bright \w spot|strong="H0934"\w*, and it \add be\add* no \w lower|strong="H8217"\w* than the \add other\add* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, but \add be\add* somewhat \w dark|strong="H3544"\w*; then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* him up \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon him the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \add and\add* if it be spread \w much|strong="H6581"\w* \w abroad|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: it \add is\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.

And if the \w bright|strong="H0934"\w* \w spot|strong="H0934"\w* \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* in his place, \add and\add* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* not in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, but it \add be\add* somewhat \w dark|strong="H3544"\w*; it \add is\add* a \w rising|strong="H7613"\w* of the \w burning|strong="H4348"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*: for it \add is\add* an \w inflammation|strong="H6867"\w* of the \w burning|strong="H4348"\w*.
¶ If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* have a \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* or the \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*: and, behold, if it \add be\add* in \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*; \add and there be\add* in it a \w yellow|strong="H6669"\w* \w thin|strong="H1851"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w*; then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: it \add is\add* a dry \w scall|strong="H5424"\w*, \add even\add* a \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* or \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*.

And if the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w*, and, behold, it \add be\add* not in \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, and \add that there is\add* no \w black|strong="H7838"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* in it; then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* up \add him that hath\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

And in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* not, and there be in it no \w yellow|strong="H6669"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w*, and the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* \add be\add* not in \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*;

He shall be \w shaven|strong="H1548"\w*, but the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* shall he not \w shave|strong="H1548"\w*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* up \add him that hath\add* the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w more|strong="H8145"\w*:

And in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* be not \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, nor \add be\add* in \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* than the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*; then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*: and he shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.
But if the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* \w much|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* his \w cleansing|strong="H2893"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on him: and, behold, if the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* be \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall not \w seek|strong="H1239"\w* for \w yellow|strong="H6669"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w*; he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

But if the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* be in his \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* at a \w stay|strong="H5975"\w*, and \add that\add* there is \w black|strong="H7838"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w grown|strong="H6779"\w* up therein; the \w scall|strong="H5424"\w* is \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*, he \add is\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

¶ If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* also or a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* have in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* bright \w spots|strong="H0934"\w*, \add even\add* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* bright \w spots|strong="H0934"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the bright \w spots|strong="H0934"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add be\add* \w darkish|strong="H3544"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*; it \add is\add* a freckled \w spot|strong="H0933"\w* \add that\add* \w groweth|strong="H6524"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*; he \add is\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whose hair is \w fallen|strong="H4803"\w* off his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, he \add is\add* \w bald|strong="H7142"\w*; \add yet is\add* he \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.\f + \fr 13.40 \ft hair…: Heb. head is pilled\f*

And he that hath his hair \w fallen|strong="H4803"\w* off from the \w part|strong="H6285"\w* of his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* toward his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, he \add is\add* forehead \w bald|strong="H1371"\w*: \add yet is\add* he \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.

And if there be in the bald \w head|strong="H7146"\w*, or bald \w forehead|strong="H1372"\w*, a \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w reddish|strong="H0125"\w* \w sore|strong="H5061"\w*; it \add is\add* a \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w sprung|strong="H6524"\w* up in his bald \w head|strong="H7146"\w*, or his bald \w forehead|strong="H1372"\w*.

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon it: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w rising|strong="H7613"\w* of the \w sore|strong="H5061"\w* \add be\add* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w reddish|strong="H0125"\w* in his bald \w head|strong="H7146"\w*, or in his bald \w forehead|strong="H1372"\w*, as the \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w appeareth|strong="H4758"\w* in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*;

He is a \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*: the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce him \w utterly|strong="H2930"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*; his \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add is\add* in his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

And the \w leper|strong="H6879"\w* in whom the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add is\add*, his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* shall be \w rent|strong="H6533"\w*, and his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w bare|strong="H6544"\w*, and he shall put a \w covering|strong="H5844"\w* upon his upper \w lip|strong="H8222"\w*, and shall \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, \w Unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

All the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* wherein the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add shall be\add* in him he shall be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*; he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*: he shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w alone|strong="H0910"\w*; \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \add shall\add* his \w habitation|strong="H4186"\w* \add be\add*.

¶ The \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* also that the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* is in, \add whether it be\add* a \w woollen|strong="H6785"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, or a \w linen|strong="H6593"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*;

Whether \add it be\add* in the \w warp|strong="H8359"\w*, or \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*; of \w linen|strong="H6593"\w*, or of \w woollen|strong="H6785"\w*; whether in a \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, or in any thing \w made|strong="H4399"\w* of \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*;\f + \fr 13.48 \ft thing…: Heb. work of\f*

And if the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* be \w greenish|strong="H3422"\w* or \w reddish|strong="H0125"\w* in the \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, or in the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w either|strong="H0176"\w* in the \w warp|strong="H8359"\w*, or in the \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*, or in any \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* of \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*; it \add is\add* a \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*, and shall be \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:\f + \fr 13.49 \ft thing: Heb. vessel, or, instrument\f*

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*, and \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* up \add it that hath\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

And he shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: if the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* be \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, either in the \w warp|strong="H8359"\w*, or in the \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*, or in a \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \add or\add* in any \w work|strong="H4399"\w* that is \w made|strong="H6213"\w* of \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*; the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add is\add* a \w fretting|strong="H3992"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*; it \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

He shall therefore \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* that \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, whether \w warp|strong="H8359"\w* or \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*, in \w woollen|strong="H6785"\w* or in \w linen|strong="H6593"\w*, or any \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* of \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, wherein the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* is: for it \add is\add* a \w fretting|strong="H3992"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*; it shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And if the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* be not \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, \w either|strong="H0176"\w* in the \w warp|strong="H8359"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* in the \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* in any \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* of \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w command|strong="H6680"\w* that they \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \add the thing\add* wherein the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add is\add*, and he shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* it up \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w more|strong="H8145"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that it is \w washed|strong="H3526"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* have not \w changed|strong="H2015"\w* his \w colour|strong="H5869"\w*, and the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* be not \w spread|strong="H6581"\w*; it \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*; thou shalt \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; it \add is\add* \w fret|strong="H6356"\w* inward, \add whether\add* it \add be\add* bare \w within|strong="H7146"\w* or \w without|strong="H1372"\w*.\f + \fr 13.55 \ft whether…: Heb. whether it be bald in the head thereof, or in the forehead thereof\f*

And if the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add be\add* somewhat \w dark|strong="H3544"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w washing|strong="H3526"\w* of it; then he shall \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* it out of the \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, or out of the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, or out of the \w warp|strong="H8359"\w*, or out of the \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*:

And if it \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* in the \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, either in the \w warp|strong="H8359"\w*, or in the \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*, or in any \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* of \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*; it \add is\add* a \w spreading|strong="H6524"\w* \add plague:\add* thou shalt \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* that wherein the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add is\add* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And the \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, either \w warp|strong="H8359"\w*, or \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*, or whatsoever \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* of \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \add it be\add*, which thou shalt \w wash|strong="H3526"\w*, if the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* be \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from them, then it shall be \w washed|strong="H3526"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* time, and shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* in a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* of \w woollen|strong="H6785"\w* or \w linen|strong="H6593"\w*, either in the \w warp|strong="H8359"\w*, or \w woof|strong="H6154"\w*, or any \w thing|strong="H3627"\w* of \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, to pronounce it \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*, or to pronounce it \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.
